articles.title: Floral Basket Presented to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket Presented to Kim Jong Il

					Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket by officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of embassies of various countries here on the 63rd anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					
					The floral basket was handed to an official concerned on Friday by Hossam Moshir, cultural councilor of the Egyptian embassy here on behalf of those embassy officials.

articles.title: U.S. Travel Company to Launch DPRK Tourism
articles.content:
U.S. Travel Company to Launch DPRK Tourism

					Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The Illinois-based Asia-Pacific Travel Company on August 25 released an announcement that the Kumgangsan Hotel will be available for Mt. Kumgang tourists from next year, according to VOA. 
					
					It is known for the first time that the hotel will open for foreign tourists, and until now foreign tourist groups have lodged at a hotel in Wonsan City during their tour of Mt. Kumgang, the radio said, adding: 
					
					The company announced that it would debut a new program of touring the DPRK's famous mountains from June to September next year. The program will include Mts. Paektu and Chilbo, Hamhung and Wonsan cities and other amazing and historical sites which had been difficult to visit.  
					
					It will be the first time for Americans to tour Mt. Paektu. 
					
					The company also said that the DPRK tourism would be organized during celebrations of the centennial birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Grave of Kim Po Hyon
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Grave of Kim Po Hyon

					Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the grave of Kim Po Hyon, grandfather of President Kim Il Sung, in Mangyongdae on Friday on the 56th anniversary of his demise.
					
					Present at a wreath-laying ceremony were Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Mun Kyong Dok and others, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, ministries, national institutions and in the field of education and working people in the city.
					
					Seen there was a wreath from Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					Placed before the grave were wreaths in the name of the WPK Central Committee, ministries and national institutions, educational organs and party and power organs, farms and others in the city.
					
					The participants paid silent tribute to Kim Po Hyon, looking back on his noble life in which he let his family members embark on the road of the revolutionary struggle with ardent patriotism and noble traits and devoted his all to the country and people.

articles.title: U.S. Development of Bunker Buster Censured: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Development of Bunker Buster Censured: Rodong Sinmun

					Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is stepping up the production of Bunker Buster. Its air force has already put an order for it with munitions industry.
					
					Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Friday says:
					
					The U.S. stepped-up production of the bomb is to meet its war purpose and the DPRK is its primary target.
					
					Two years ago the U.S. Defense Department openly said that the development of Bunker Buster is an urgent request of the U.S. Pacific Command and the U.S. Central Command whose main operation targets are the DPRK and Iran.
					
					The U.S. seeks to bomb the military and strategic targets of the DPRK all of a sudden by use of B-2 loaded with Bunker Buster in "contingency" on the Korean Peninsula in a bid to disable them.
					
					The development of the latest military hardware and their modernization on the part of the U.S. reveal its reckless scenario to mount a preemptive nuclear attack.
					
					The U.S. warmongers, after putting those countries incurring its displeasure on the list of preemptive nuclear attack, buckled down to developing rapid strike means.
					
					The U.S. is trying to find a way-out of catastrophic economic crisis in fresh arms race and war of aggression. Therefore, it is directing its focus on the Korean Peninsula. This is typified by the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises it waged with the south Korean warmongers, defying the domestic and foreign public protest and condemnation.
					
					These moves are crimes swimming against the tide of the times towards disarmament and peace. It is a pipe dream for the U.S. to try to dominate the world by force.

articles.title: S. Korean Police's Scheme to Reinforce Repressive Forces on Jeju Island
articles.content:
S. Korean Police's Scheme to Reinforce Repressive Forces on Jeju Island

					Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The fascist police are contemplating reinforcing the repressive forces on Jeju Island to crack down on actions against the Jeju naval base construction, according to south Korean KBS.
					
					On August 31 an officer concerned of the puppet Police Agency disclosed that at least 490 police troops including four units of the Seoul Riot Police Corps would be additionally hurled into the island under the pretext of dealing with a meeting for protesting against the base construction slated to take place on coming Saturday.
					
					The chief of the Police Agency appeared at Soguipho police station in July and blustered that he would more strongly deal with the actions against the base construction. On August 14 he hurled more than 600 police troops heavily armed with repressive gears into Kangjong Village from the inland.
					
					The fascist authorities issued an emergency alert order to all the police forces on Jeju Island and instructed them to keep themselves to go into action once protest actions take place.
					
					Meanwhile, the puppet authorities are kicking up a wholesale repressive campaign against those opposed to the project. They walked off and detained islanders and civic activists including the chief of the Kangjong Village Association and arrested Rev. Mun Jong Hyon on the charge of disturbing the performance of their duty.
					
					Various circles in south Korea are denouncing the authorities for working hard to revive the nightmare of the April 3 incident on Jeju Island, strongly demanding the withdrawal of the police troops and a stop to the base project.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group Accused of Extolling Chieftain of Korean War of Aggression
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group Accused of Extolling Chieftain of Korean War of Aggression

					Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The puppet Commendation Agency committed such pro-U.S. servile act as selecting MacArthur, chieftain of the Korean war of aggression, as a "war hero", according to KBS of south Korea on August 31.
					
					MacArthur is the chief architect of national division and the heinous enemy who imposed unbearable misfortunes and pain upon the Koreans.
					
					He earned an ill-fame as a war maniac who sought to ignite a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula and a murderer who mercilessly killed millions of Koreans during the war.
					
					He committed indelible crimes before the Korean nation and inflicted unhealable wounds upon it. Yet, the south Korean puppet conservative group is kowtowing to the U.S., erecting his statue and is busy perpetrating such humiliating acts as extolling him as a "hero."
					
					This group is nothing but a gang of human scum and traitors who are no longer entitled to belong to the Korean nation.
					
					The above-said humiliating action is lashing the south Korean people from all walks of life into towering resentment.

articles.title: Traitor Syngman Rhee's Hurling of Minors into Korean War Disclosed
articles.content:
Traitor Syngman Rhee's Hurling of Minors into Korean War Disclosed

					Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The fact that traitor Syngman Rhee of south Korea hurled even minors under 17 into shambles of the Korean War was disclosed recently. 
					
					This was made known recently by information available from the Ministry of Defense of south Korea.
					
					According to it, Syngman Rhee pressganged many minors into the puppet army during the war. Their number reached 29 597, counting only those disclosed so far. Among them were girls.
					
					As the confirmation is not yet over, the number of minors is believed to be much more than that.
					
					This information was confirmed through various services, the Military Service Agency and the Ministry of Administration and Security while the military book compiling research institution under the puppet Ministry of Defense was compiling the "History of boy and girl volunteers' participation in the June 25 war".
					
					With no rhetoric can the traitors conceal their criminal acts of offering even minors as cannon fodder for war started by the U.S. imperialist aggressors for their frantic confrontation with compatriots.

articles.title: Enemy Targeting Iran's Economy
articles.content:
Enemy Targeting Iran's Economy

					Tehran, September 1 (KCNA) -- Leader of the Islamic Revolution Ayatollah Seyyed Ali Khamenei said that the global arrogance is doing its best to blow a strike on Iran's economy, but the vigilance of Iranian officials and the resistance of the Iranian nation will foil their efforts. Supreme leader made the remarks in a meeting with President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad and his cabinet members in Tehran on Sunday.
					
					"The enemies were speaking about crippling sanctions for Iran in the beginning of the current Iranian year (March 2, 2011), but fortunately not only the sanctions did not turn out to be crippling, but also Iran achieved self-sufficiency in numerous industrial and scientific areas," Ayatollah Khamenei noted.

articles.title: Iran Rejects Double-dealing Attitude of West
articles.content:
Iran Rejects Double-dealing Attitude of West

					Tehran, September 1 (KCNA) -- The deputy chief of Staff of the General Command of Armed Forces of Iran denounced the double-dealing attitude of the West towards the issue of terror on Aug. 30. 
					
					The West uses the issue of terror as means for pressurizing independent countries and, therefore, it continues aiding terrorist organizations in the world, he said. 
					
					The West supports terrorism favorable for it but brands the resistance movement against occupation and aggression as terrorism, he noted, and went on:
					
					Iran is the biggest victim of terrorism. The U.S. assertion that Iran supports terrorist groups is groundless. It aims at launching psychological warfare against Iran.

articles.title: Nigerian President Pledges Improved Security Nationwide
articles.content:
Nigerian President Pledges Improved Security Nationwide

					Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Nigerian President Goodluck Jonathan called upon the people of Nigeria to make efforts for the development of the country in a recent letter.
					
					He said with the new national economic management team in place, Nigerians should look forward to the fulfillment of the promise of socioeconomic revitalization, job creation and the renewal of national infrastructure in the coming months. The president also stressed the need for all Nigerians to have a role to play in the urgent task of the nation-building. He urged Nigerians to rededicate themselves to supporting the government in every possible way to ensure that the country continues to make steady progress.

articles.title: Bolivian Govt. Ratifies Its Fight against Capitalism
articles.content:
Bolivian Govt. Ratifies Its Fight against Capitalism

					Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Bolivian President Evo Morales on Tuesday ratified the fight of his government against capitalism, colonialism and imperialism.
					
					When attending the signing of the draft agreement Rural Alliances, Morales insisted on the importance of fighting against the historical enemies of Bolivia.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores de funcionarios de embajadas en Corea
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores de funcionarios de embajadas en Corea

					Pyongyang, 2 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio un cesto de flores que le dirigieran los funcionarios encargados de asuntos culturales y de amistad de las embajadas de varios paises, acreditados en Corea, con motivo del 63o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					En representacion de ellos, el consejero cultural de la Embajada de la Republica Arabe de Egipto, Hossam Moshir, lo traslado este viernes a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Agencia de turismo de EE.UU. oferta turismo al monte Paektu
articles.content:
Agencia de turismo de EE.UU. oferta turismo al monte Paektu

					Pyongyang, 2 de septiembre (ACNC) -- De acuerdo con VOA, la Agencia de Turismo de Asia-Pacifico en Illinois de Estados Unidos aclaro el 25 de agosto que los turistas al monte Kumgang podran usar desde el ano proximo el Hotel Kumgangsan.
					
					Es la primera vez que se comunicara a los turistas extranjeros la apertura del Hotel Kumgangsan y actualmente, los turistas extranjeros al monte Kumgang se alojan en un hotel de Wonsan. 
					
					Desde junio hasta septiembre del proximo ano, se iniciara el turismo a los lugares impresionantes e historicos, que antes eran dificilmente accesibles, como los famosos montes Paektu y Chilbo, las ciudades de Hamhung y Wonsan, etc.
					
					Asi se recomendo por primera vez a los turistas estadounidenses el turismo al monte Paektu. 
					
					La agencia aclaro ademas que el viaje a Corea no se interrumpira ni durante los actos conmemorativos del centenario de natalicio del Presidente            Kim Il Sung programados para abril del ano venidero.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun rechaza el desarrollo de Bunker Buster por EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun rechaza el desarrollo de Bunker Buster por EE.UU.

					Pyongyang, 2 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En estos dias, Estados Unidos promueve la produccion de Bunker Buster, bomba para destruir las instalaciones subterraneas. Las fuerzas aereas norteamericanas ya la habian pedido a un complejo de industria belica.
					
					La produccion y el despliegue de esa bomba persiguen evidentemente su uso en la guerra contra otros paises, en particular, contra la RPDC.
					
					Asi revela el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este viernes y continua:
					
					Hace dos anos, el Departamento de Defensa norteamericano publico abiertamente que el desarrollo de la bomba Bunker Buster obedece al pedido urgente de la Comandancia del Pacifico de EE.UU. y la Comandancia Central de EE.UU., encargadas de las operaciones contra la RPDC e Iran.
					
					El imperio intenta neutralizar las instalaciones militares estrategicas de la RPDC bombardeandolas sorpresivamente con los bombarderos Stealth "B-2" cargados de Bunker Buster y otros medios en el "tiempo de emergencia" de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					El desarrollo y la modernizacion de los equipos belicos de punta por EE.UU. parten claramente de su imprudente intento de ataque preventivo nuclear.
					
					Los belicistas norteamericanos definieron a varios paises, que no le agradan, como blancos de ataque preventivo nuclear y dan acicate al desarrollo de los medios de golpe rapido para ejecutar el ataque.
					
					EE.UU. dirige su flecha a la Peninsula Coreana  tratando de buscar la salida de la devastadora crisis economica en la nueva carrera armamentista y la guerra de agresion.
					
					Lo muestra bien el hecho de que las fuerzas belicistas norteamericanas libraron hace poco con los surcoreanos los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Ulji Freedom Guardian" desoyendo las protestas internas y externas.
					
					Tales actos criminales desafian a la corriente de la epoca hacia el desarme y la paz y es irrealizable la intencion de EE.UU. de dominar el mundo con la fuerza.

articles.title: Sobrepasara un millon victimas mortales del incidente de Fukushima
articles.content:
Sobrepasara un millon victimas mortales del incidente de Fukushima

					Pyongyang, 2 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Segun el periodico britanico Independent, se presume que moriran mas de un millon de personas como consecuencia del accidente nuclear en la central de Fukushima de Japon.
					
					 El periodico transmitio que prosigue hasta ahora la fuga de radiaciones de la central siniestrada y la situacion es mucho mas grave que el incidente de Chernobyl que dejo 200 mil muertos.
